title: AR vs. VR: A Simple Guide to Augmented and Virtual Reality
description: Augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) redefine how we interact with digital spaces. AR layers computer-generated content onto the physical world, seamlessly merging digital elements with real environments. VR, on the other hand, creates entirely synthetic worlds, transporting users into fully immersive digital experiences.  Knowing the distinctions between AR and VR isn't just about terminology — it's about understanding how these technologies shape industries, from gaming and enterprise solutions to health care and beyond. What is augmented reality?Augmented reality seamlessly blends digital elements with the real world, enhancing what we see, hear, and interact with. Unlike virtual reality, which immerses users in a fully digital space, AR keeps users anchored in their physical environment while adding interactive digital layers. This can range from simple overlays, like navigation prompts in Google Maps Live View, to more advanced apps, such as AR-powered remote...more
author: Corey Noles

title: Apple's New Ambient Music App in iOS 18.4 Gives You Quick Access to Relaxing Soundscapes
description: With iOS 18.4 and iPadOS 18.4, Apple introduces a new Ambient Music feature designed to enhance user well-being through curated soundscapes. This feature offers four distinct categories — Chill, Productivity, Sleep, and Wellbeing — each providing a tailored auditory experience to suit various moods and activities. While iOS 18.4 and iPadOS 18.4 won't be released to the general public until April, you can test the new Ambient Music app as a beta user if you're comfortable running beta software on your devices. Currently, the Ambient Music app cannot be found on the Home Screen, in the App Library, or via Spotlight Search, and there are no actions for it yet in the Shortcuts app. Instead, you need to add one or more Ambient Music controls to your Control Center to use the app. You can also replace the two shortcuts for Flashlight and Camera on the Lock Screen with Ambient Music controls. Adding Ambient Music controls to your Control CenterTo incorporate Ambient Music into your Control...more

title: These Countries Get the Best Sleep (And It’s Not Where You’d Expect)
description: In the most comprehensive global sleep study ever conducted, IKEA surveyed 55,000 people across 57 markets – and the results challenge everything we thought we knew about rest. If sleep was an Olympic sport, China would take gold while the US and Norway – despite their high living standards – would be fighting to avoid last place. This groundbreaking research reveals not just who’s sleeping best, but also exposes a troubling global sleep deficit of 1 hour and 20 minutes […] The post These Countries Get the Best Sleep (And It’s Not Where You’d Expect) appeared first on IKEA Hackers.

title: IKEA’s Latest Collection Might Be The Bedroom Refresh You’ve Been Looking For
description: In January, IKEA rolled out its latest products along with an encouraging mantra, “What’s new is up to you.” The inspiration behind this phrase comes from the Swedish superstore’s continual focus on tried-and-true pieces, giving new life to old furniture, and crafting beautiful spaces by blending timeless favorites with new standouts. One space where this concept works beautifully is the bedroom.
